eo:properties.description:
### Distribution Transmission Line: predicted low-voltage infrastructure in kilometres per cell


[![contributor](https://img.shields.io/badge/gee--awesome--datasets-data%20commons%20contributor-green)](https://github.com/samapriya/awesome-gee-community-datasets)     


Raster of predicted low-voltage infrastructure in kilometres per cell


Cite using:  


```Arderne, Christopher, NIcolas, Claire, Zorn, Conrad, & Koks, Elco E. (2020). Data from: Predictive mapping of the global power system using open data (Version 1.1.1) [Data set]. Nature Scientific Data. Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3628142```   


This data was created with code in the following three repositories:

https://github.com/carderne/gridfinder

https://github.com/carderne/predictive-mapping-global-power


https://github.com/carderne/access-estimator

Full steps to reproduce are contained in this file:

https://github.com/carderne/predictive-mapping-global-power/blob/master/README.md

The data can be visualized at the following location:

https://gridfinder.org

 License: **Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC-BY-SA-4.0)**
